page.title: 16STRANGE PETS
page.content: MRS BUTLER IS A LADY THAT LOOKS AFTER RESCUED ANIMALS.SHE HAS A FOX CUB AND A YOUNG FALLOW DEER. THE DEER IS COLOURED DARK BROWN AND DRINKS GOATS MILK. WHEN IT GROWS UP IT WILL PROBABLY HAVE A BROWN BODY WITH WHITE SPOTS. THE FOX CUB HAS DAMAGED EYES.IT EATS MEAT AND EGG AND DRINKS MILK.IT WAS ABOUT TWO DAYS OLD WHEN MRS BUTLER GOT IT.THEY FOUND IT BY THE EDGE OF THE MOTORWAY. ANY ADULT OR CHILD SHOULD LEAVE YOUNG WILD ANIMALS ALONE BECAUSE THEY COULD PUT THEIR SCENT ON THEM AND THE MOTHER WILL REJECT THEM.
